dc_title_s: United States Department of Agriculture (USDA), Watershed Boundary Dataset
dc_description_s: The Watershed Boundary Dataset contains boundaries of watersheds throughout the country. According to the USDA, “Watershed boundaries define the aerial extent of surface water drainage to a point.“The hydrologic units are nested in a hierarchical system, so basins are comprised of subbasins, subbasins, subbasins are comprised of watersheds, and watersheds are comprised of subwatersheds. The boundaries can assist in land use and water use planning.
dc_creator_sm: Coordinated effort between the United States Department of Agriculture-Natural Resources Conservation Service (USDA-NRCS)
